Centrality and variability measures
Players data
```{r}
players = c(40000, 18000, 12000, 250000, 30000, 140000, 300000, 40000, 800000)
```
Mean
```{r}
mean(players)
```
Median
```{r}
median(players)
```
Quartiles
```{r}
q = quantile(players)
q
```
3rd Quartile
```{r}
q[4]
```
standard deviation
```{r}
sd(players)
```
summary
```{r}
summary(players)
```
